snippet: The Oaktree Capital Group priced at $43 a share, at the bottom of the expected range for the investment giant, as the underwriters also cut the size of the initial public offering.
abstract: The Oaktree Capital Group priced at $43 a share, at the bottom of the expected range for the investment giant, as the underwriters also cut the size of the initial public offering.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

headline.main: Oaktree Prices I.P.O. at $43, at Bottom of Range
